DOC.brief_summary: An investigator-initiated , prospective , consecutively enrol , non-randomized single institution clinical evaluation safety effectiveness physician modification currently FDA-approved shelf thoracic aortic stent graft ( COOK Zenith® TX2® ) preserve branch vessel use treatment patient thoraco-abdominal aortic aneurysm . The primary objective study determine whether physician modify branch endovascular graft safe effective method treat patient thoraco-abdominal aortic aneurysm .

After fenestration create , mark , reinforce , additional metal radio-opaque marker sew graft assist device orientation fluoroscopy . Additional suture may use time constrain endograft , either temporary permanent fashion facilitate subsequent deployment . The device re-constrained re-sheathed within original Zenith® TX2® delivery sheath . The modified stent graft deploy reline peri-visceral abdominal aorta . Proximal distal fixation seal achieve use modify TX2® device , additional unmodified TX2® device and/or Cook Zenith® Flex® Endologix AFX™ device depend aortic anatomy .
